original_text: Then I told her, ‘You must stay at home with me for many days. You must not live as a prostitute. You must not have sex with any other man. I will also be faithful to you.’
korean_text: 그에게 이르기를 너는 많은 날 동안 나와 함께 지내고 음행하지 말며 다른 남자를 따르지 말라 나도 네게 그리하리라 하였노라

sentences.original_text: You must stay at home with me
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나와 함께 집에 머물러야 한다

sentences.original_text: You must not live as a prostitute
You must not have sex with any other man
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다른 남자와 성관계를 가져서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: I will also be faithful to you
